title: Spectating doesn't appear to work
body:
I get a loading screen fine, but then a failure to download spectate data error pop up appears.

Logs look like this:

> League of Legends.exe(00004BF0): ALWAYS| Start Main Loop
> League of Legends.exe(00004BF0): ALWAYS| ReplayDataManagerClient: Didnt have a valid chunk.  keyframe: -1   chunk: 2
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(00008B48):   WARN| RemotingClientTransport: Couldn't connect to host, connect() returned: -1 with errno: 10049: The requested address is not valid in its context.
> League of Legends.exe(00008B48):  ERROR| LCURemotingClient: Unable to connect to app process.
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayNetClient GetChunk error. HTTP status code: 404
> League of Legends.exe(000019CC):  ERROR| ReplayDownloader: download disabled due to errors fetching data

Is this an issue with the server, or would this be a problem on my side?

replies.body: Greetings! This could be an issue with the server, but it's hard to tell at the moment. When did you start noticing this issue, and are you still encountering the issue?
Happening since Patch 8.21. Looks like Riot knows about this already: https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
Ah, gotcha! Thanks for the heads up!
